selectHyperslab

public void selectHyperslab(SelectionOperator op,
                            long[] start,
                            long[] stride,
                            long[] count,
                            long[] block)
Selects a hyperslab region to add to the current selected region.

Regions selected with this function call default to C order iteration when I/O is performed.

Parameters:
start - starting coordinates of the hyperslab to select
stride - how many elements to move in each dimension
count - how many blocks to select from the dataspace, in each dimension
block - size of the element block selected from the dataspace
